meanings.definition: Capable of being regulated or controlled.
meanings.sent1: The temperature in the room was regulable with the thermostat.
meanings.sent2: The volume on the TV was regulable, so I could adjust it to my liking.
meanings.sent3: The regulable fan decided to spin faster just to show off.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a regulable faucet, easily turned on and off.
meanings.sent5: The regulable clock ticked at a pace that matched my heartbeat.

meanings.definition: Able to be adjusted or managed.
meanings.sent1: The regulable chair allowed me to change its height for comfort.
meanings.sent2: The regulable settings on the camera made it easy to take clear photos.
meanings.sent3: The regulable cat toy kept the feline entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: His mood was as regulable as the dimmer switch on a light.
meanings.sent5: The regulable backpack straps ensured a perfect fit for any wearer.

meanings.sent1: The regulable behavior of the students made teaching easier.
meanings.sent2: The regulable speed limit kept drivers safe on the road.
meanings.sent3: The regulable dress code at work required everyone to wear ties.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like regulable traffic, following a set pattern.
meanings.sent5: The regulable schedule allowed for flexibility in completing tasks.
